name: Tokyo by Night: Kindred Inc
description:
Summary

With your career on the decline, you've managed to drink yourself into a stupor near one of the busiest stations in Tokyo. Little do you know, you might soon be trading in your soul-sucking job for a blood-sucking one...

Creator's notes

I hope you enjoy my mini kinetic novel! This game was created for the Vampire: the Masquerade jam. It is about 3,000 words, so around 5 to 10 minutes playtime, with one non-kindred ending and 1.5ish kindred endings. It also has a photo of a cat.

This is my first ever game, and it's been cathartic writing about some of my and my friends' experiences through a VTM lens. I'm hoping to expand the story in the future, perhaps with some art as well, so any feedback is welcome!

Credits

Story, programming (Ren'py), and photography by AlmondPaste

(With apologies that not all photos are exactly Tokyo but all are very close by!)

Music by Inperfektion (Track: Monster), used under an Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported (CC BY-NC-SA 3.0):

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/InPerfektion/Monsters_1409/04_inperfektion_-_...

And thank you to Paradox Interactive for hosting the game jam and providing the opportunity to use the VTM universe as a setting.
